title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP][个人汉化]NarutoC--火影忍者mod 有话直说就是我的忍道
author: jrant
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jrant 于 2016-3-29 10:59 编辑 

具体介绍请移步[1.6.2-1.72][ssp/smp][永久更新]火影忍者CMOD
更新记录
现在最新版本是Release v0.5.6（1.7.10）（14-12-2015）
0.3.2之后的版本更新记录官网上全部没有
Release v0.3.2 (1.6.2) (22-08-2013)

+added chakra control now let you climb any wall like a ladder
+added adding an experimental clone jutsu (seals: 1,1,3,2,3)
+added experimental byakugan (it will damage the oponents chakra if has any)
+fixed and outfit crash bug fixed.
+changed attribute save place.
Release v0.3.1 (1.6.2) (16-07-2013)

+Minecraft 1.6.2 Compatibility update.
+-Few fixes and… maybe new bugs… (thanks to 1.6)
Release v0.3.0 (1.5.2) (25-05-2013)

New RPG System Press the (default) J key.
New Command to add Training Points (/nctp (amount) [playerName])
New Mob (Ninja) watch out they are strong and fire katon housenka no jutsu. They give 3 NCxp
New Biome Ninja Forest for spawning the Ninja mobs in.
Release v0.2 (1.5.1) (18-04-2013)

+tweaked Jutsu system little tweaked.
+added right combination gives a chat message that tells you what jutsu you will make and its cost.
+added 18 New Konoha outfits from Team 7, 8, 9 and an Akatsuki outfit is added too
Release v0.1c (1.5.1) (28-03-2013)

+added early jutsu system
+added 3 jutsu’s Katon Housenka no jutsu, Chidori and Rasengan
+fixed water walking
+fixed multiplayer issues
Release v0.1b (1.5.1) (22-03-2013)

+compatibility with minecraft 1.5.1
Release v0.1a (1.5) (15-03-2013)

+compatibility with minecraft 1.5
Release v0.1 (1.4.7) (03-03-2013)

+added Chakra bar
+added kunai
+added shuriken
+added giant shuriken
+added explosive tag
+added kunai with explosive tag
+added JBRA Compatibility
+added Konoha Ninja outfit



关于食用方法（未汉化）其实和龙珠差不多了Every key is configurable– First thing you need to do is press “V” to create your character and choose for power Chakra user.– The default is “C” to Release Chakra. You always have to Release Chakra to use Chakra.– To decrease Chakra Release percentage press and hold “Ctrl+C” or just press “H”.– To regenerate Chakra you must have release below 50%. Closer to 0% release = faster regeneration.– Without Chakra you wont be able to use Chakra based techniques.– If you hold jump you will Chakra jump the longer you press it.– Press “V” to view your Attributes, Skills or Jutsus.– You need to learn Skills to use Chakra based techniques. Press “V” and select Skills, and top right click on “learn”.– Learn first Chakra Control skill to use Chakra Control. You can come up from underwater faster and “walk on Water”, even climb walls and hang from ceilings.– Learn Ninjutsu Skill to use Ninjutsus and learn an Affinity to use ninjutsus with affinity.– To create a custom Ninjutsu press “V” select Jutsu. Custom Ninjutsus need Ninjutsu skill and an Affinity.– To learn a pre-made Jutsu press “V” select Jutsu and above press Next. Press Learn to learn a pre-made Jutsu. To use Genjutsus learn first the Genjutsu skill.– Learn Taijutsu Skill to power up you punches.  You make jutsus by pressing first the right click with nothing in hand!– To Cast a Jutsu or use Chakra Punch you need to have an empty hand.– Every Jutsu has a numeric combination. The keys are default on Numeric pad 1, 2, 3.– If you already have learned a Jutsu the numeric combination will show up on right side of the screen if you have above 0% release.– If the numeric combination is red you can not use that Jutsu cause it needs a skill to be learned.– Cast the Jutsus after pressing the right combination with Right Click.– To clear the pressed combination press Right Click, but it will only clear it if the combination doesnt match any learned Jutsu.
– To add Training Points Type: /jrmctp (amount) [playerName]– To change attributes:   /jrmca (Set or Add) (Attribute or All) (Amount or Max) [playerName]you can set or add points to attributeswhere Attribute can be Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Willpower, Mind, ConcentrationAmount is a number from 1 to 120 Attributes point.for giving everything use /jrmca Set All Maxor for resetting everything use /jrmca Set All Reset.
和龙珠mod的作者是同一个可以兼容和龙珠mod的作者是同一个可以兼容和龙珠mod的作者是同一个可以兼容重要的事说三遍

帖子更新记录2016.02.120.5.7完全汉化2016.02.09未完全汉化0.5.7版2016.01.31发布汉化
